thumb.title: GTA6のトレーラーで使用された曲集＋α
thumb.description: GTA6のトレーラー１＆２で使用された楽曲と個人的に選んだ曲のまとめ。全１１曲。以下リスト↓#0:00 The Pointer Sisters - Hot Together (1986)#4:19 Jay Ferguson - Thunder Island (1977)#7:53 The Smiths - How Soon Is Now? (1984)#14:45 Joan Jett - I Love Rock 'n' Roll (1982)#17:45 Wang Chung - Everybody Have Fun Tonight (1986)#22:37 Michael Jackson - Speed Demon (1989)#26:47 Zenglen - Child Support (2004)#31:49 Tammy Wynette - Talkin’ to Myself Again (1987)#35:18 Chris Rea - On the Beach (1986)#39:31 DeBarge - Rhythm Of The Night (1985)#43:26 Tom Petty - Love Is A Long Road (1989)
